LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.de: Evolve the honeycan species by an internal drive, making it possible to hatch medicinal cocoons, medical abilities and the manipulation of pseudophytes, at the cost of losing the ability to produce honeydew.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Medicine.co: To release evolution, research plan/node MED-1 "healing species" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.label: Honey can type conversion——flammable chamber
LanguageData.ARA_Myrmecocystus_Production_Fuel.descri: Evolve the honeycan species by internal drive, allowing them to produce chemical fuel at the cost of losing their ability to produce honeydew. This will strengthen their armor and even give them the ability to shoot fire.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
To release evolution, research project/node FEL-8 "Deflagration Cavity" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.label: Warrior species conversion—hidden slayer
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.description: Evolve your warrior species through an internal drive, gaining near-permanent concealment and powerful melee combat capabilities at the cost of losing the ability to use ranged weapons and special skills.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Invisibility.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node CLO-4 "tracking species" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.label: Warrior species conversion—gene thief
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.description: The warrior species is evolved by an internal drive, gaining the ability to steal genes from enemies and transfer genes to colonists at the cost of loss of combat ability and ability to use skills.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Fighter_Genestealer.comps.CompAbilit: To release evolution, research plan/node STL-5 "Gene Stealing" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.label: Lost mist species conversion—Giant bacteria specialization
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Production_Bacterium.descri: We will evolve the Stray Mist species by internal drive, and at the cost of losing pheromone injection ability and armor performance, we will be able to regularly produce the high-grade Arachne insect material "Activated Giant Bacteria".\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
To release evolution, research plan/node BAC-1 "breeding seed" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.label: Lost fog species conversion——creep support
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.description: The Stray Mist species is evolved by an internal drive, gaining defense power, movement speed, and the ability to deploy creep over a wide range and at high speed at the cost of losing the ability to emit pheromones.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Smokepop_Creeper.comps.CompAbilityEf: To release evolution, research plan/node CRP-3 "Creep laying" is required
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.label: Shieldhead species conversion--nest guardian
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.description: The shieldhead species is evolved by internal drive, and at the cost of losing the ability to produce shell elements and build, it gains stronger combat power, mobility, and assault attack ability.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_Protector.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research project/node VTE-1 "Guardian" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.label: Shield head type conversion--Eikensha
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.description: Evolving shieldheads through internal drive, gaining stronger chitinous production and building skills at the cost of loss of defensive ability.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_ShieldHead_HiveBuilder.comps.CompAbi: To release evolution, research plan/node CON-3 "Builder" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.label: Sky Species Conversion - Lord of the Nest Bugs
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.description: Evolving the sky type by internal drive, gaining the ability to automatically project the servants of the sky type at the enemy at the cost of reduced mobility and loss of high altitude maneuverability.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Hivelord.comps.CompAbility: To release evolution, research plan/node LOD-6 "master of the nest" is required
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.label: Sky type conversion—electromagnetic storm
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.description: Evolving the Sky-Celestial species through an internal drive, at the cost of losing mobility and high-altitude maneuverability, it gains the ability to automatically project magneto-violent lizards at the enemy—these lizards release EMPs as a suicide attack to counter the mechanoids.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible!
LanguageData.ARA_Skyraider_Empthrower.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node WID-9 "Magnetic Violence" is required.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.label: Guard species conversion——Guiding light tower
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.description: The Guard species is evolved by internal drive, and at the cost of losing shooting ability, jumping ability, and commanding ability, it gains the ability to command aerial beasts.\n\nThis evolutionary process is irreversible! Please note that the Aerial Beast Insect can only be commanded after it successfully takes off - by the time this evolution path is unlocked, you should not be able to build an Aerial Beast Insect yet.
LanguageData.ARA_Praetorian_Navigator.comps.CompAbili: To release evolution, research plan/node NAV-9 "Emissary" is required.
